text: Boola mbu; “Koo khulikhomwo nende mubamutsokasinjia Nyasaye abo ulunjisinjia khubwatoto?” Boola mbu; “Nyasaye niye olunjisinjia khubwatoto” Kho ulia ulunjisinjia khubwatoto shiniye okhokheyakhane muno okhuloondwa nohomba ulia ulalunjisinjia halali okhula alunjisibwe? Kho muli nende shina, mubusinjia murie
